This is the binary representation of the instructions in the check off

OpCode for all is 00000

Add r2, r0, r0
00000 00000 00010 0000000 0 0000 00000
Add r3, r0, r2
00000 00010 00011 0000000 0 0000 00000
Sub r4, r3, r2
00011 00010 00100 0000001 0 0000 00000
Xor r5, r4, r0
00100 00000 00101 0000100 0 0000 00000
And r6, r3, r2
00011 00010 00110 0000011 0 0000 00000
Or r7, r4, r3
00100 00011 00111 0000010 0 0000 00000
